content.rendered:
• PRACTICAL DESIGN – Hax motorcycle helmet meets DOT safety standards. The aerodynamic design helps reduce wind resistance and minimize wind noise. Multiple vents can quickly replace the stuffy air. Upgrade emergency padding removal pull, safe and convenient.
  • PERFECT COMFORT – Motorcycle Street Bike Helmet is an upgraded liner with anti-allergic design, which is extremely comfortable and has good impact resistance and provide better fit. The internal design of the Bluetooth headset slot is more convenient.
  • PRODUCT ADVANTAGES – Hax helmet lenses with clear and wide vision,with Pinlock Ready plastic nails,you can purchase an anti-fog lens’ model DKS274 to install separately(Not inclued).It is suitable for PINLOCK 70 . Provide 2 different tail fins for replacement, and equipped with a thick cloth bag.You can also directly browse our store or details page to purchase Pinlock lenses.
  • PROTECTION MAX – Motorcycle full face helmet use the latest UV treatment technology with outer visor and inner sun visor, which have been tested to prevent about 98% of ultraviolet radiation, which can better protect the eyes.If you need visor of other colors to replace, you can directly visit our store or details page to purchase.
  • PERSONALIZED CHOICE – Hax motorcycles helmet provide a variety of trendy printing options.Different patterns match your cool motorcycle to show unique visual effec
